name: TreeRoot
description:
The first I made alone in Game Jam

Here we play as a root, from which we reach the water and grow our tree. We continue on our way by overcoming the obstacles in front of us.

WASD =>Movement 
R=>Restart Level

Every comment made without upsetting me is very valuable to me.  :)
